data.title: Cecil Turner Share With Friend - Cartersville, Georgia
data.meta_description: Proudly serving the families of Cartersville and the surrounding communities since 1977. Kind, compassionate funeral and cremation services. Ask a family we have served.
data.text:
Message One

Hello *Friend's Name*,

I'm sending you this notice to let you know that our friend Cecil Turner has passed away.

If you wish to sign the online guestbook and leave your condolences please follow this link.

Sincerely,

*YOUR NAME*

Message Two

Hello *Friend's Name*,

It is with deep regret that I'm e-mailing to inform you that Cecil Turner has passed away.

If you would like to view the funeral details and leave your words of condolence please click here.

Sincerely,

*YOUR NAME*
